skins.selfIntroduction: I am Friedrich der Gro?e, prototype H-class battleship of the Iron Blood Navy. Come, my child... If you are unable to sleep, allow me to play you a lullaby.
skins.acquisition: You've returned to my side once more, my child. Tell me, what is it that you wish for? Wealth? Glory? Or perhaps eternal youth?
skins.login: The performers can wait no longer! Hurry, let us raise the curtains of battle!
skins.details: My child, if you desire absolute victory, you must maintain absolute rationality.
skins.secretaryIdle1: All those emotions that you¡¯ve bottled up through all those conflicts... Listen to my concert, and let it all out.
skins.secretaryIdle2: My appearance upon the battlefield gives off an air of cruelty? Hehe... I¡¯ll take that as a compliment.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even should you anger me, I¡¯ll forgive you as long as you properly apologize.
skins.secretaryTouch: If you are ever afraid, come hide behind my back.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Just like a baby... how sweet.

skins.shipDescription: Ahh, the dreamlike beauty of this variation... let us write down this movement so that it may continue forever, my sweet child.
skins.acquisition: Ahh, the dreamlike beauty of this variation... let us write down this movement so that it may continue forever, my sweet child.
skins.login: What would you like to listen to today, my child?
skins.details: What I hope to get from you? Hehe... For me, the most important thing in the world... what I hope for the most - is you, my child.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Is there something giving you difficulty? Please tell me about it. I shall take care of everything for you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Save your cold rationality for your enemies on the battlefield. Before me, however, you need not hold back. Just indulge yourself to your heart's desire, my child.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you are tired, lie down right here... I will bring you pleasant dreams... Good, sweet child... I'll always be watching over you.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you wish to touch your beloved more intimately? Come closer, my dear child.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What a selfish child... But no matter, I shall accept you unconditionally.

skins.shipDescription: I see, so this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire. Exquisitely crafted, comfortable to the touch, and elegantly designed... How to wear it? ...My child, what are you talking about?
skins.acquisition: I see, so this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire. Exquisitely crafted, comfortable to the touch, and elegantly designed... How to wear it? ...My child, what are you talking about?
skins.login: Aren't you cold standing over there? Come to me, my child.
skins.details: Mankind's ambitions know no limits. Indeed, just like these riggings of mine... they strive to expand, to become more powerful... to command more cannons, and to seize greater glory...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sakura Empire's classical "gagaku" is said to elicit profound and mysterious emotions... I'm quite curious about it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The release of repressed emotions can be both medicine and poison. The effect depends on how well you can control your state of being.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My child, could you help me with putting on this outfit?
skins.secretaryTouch: The sensation of this embrace is the warmth of human contact... Do you understand, my child?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you like it here, my child? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Shouldn't I be the one doing this to you instead, my child?
